blocs.blog_article_title: The State of Biodiversity and how we’ll get better
blocs.blog_article_description: L’IPBES (Intergovernmental Science-Policy Platform on Biodiversity and Ecosystem Services) a rendu public son rapport 2021 sur la biodiversité qui fera date dans l’environnement.!
Sign this petition to end the massive harm done to animals and plants in the world !
